# {{README_TITLE}}

A generic Node.js application for my-node-app project.

## Setup

1. Install dependencies: `npm install`
2. Start the server: `npm start`
3. For development: `npm run dev`

## API Endpoints

- `GET /` - Welcome message
- `GET /health` - Health check endpoint

Created by Test Author.
